mapper.insert: insert into productstock (price, storeNumber, amount, product_id, depot_id) values (#{price}, #{storeNumber}, #{amount}, #{product.id}, #{depot.id})
mapper.update: update productstock set price = #{price}, storeNumber = #{storeNumber}, amount = #{amount}, product_id = #{product.id}, depot_id = #{depot.id} where id = #{id}

where.if: and (p.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.sn like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: select count(*) from productstock ps join product p on ps.product_id = p.id join depot d on ps.depot_id = d.id

select ps.id, ps.price, ps.storeNumber, ps.amount, p.id p_id, p.name p_name, p.brandName p_brandName, p.sn p_sn, p.brand_id, d.id d_id, d.name d_name from productstock ps join product p on ps.product_id = p.id join depot d on ps.depot_id = d.id
limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select ps.id, ps.price, ps.storeNumber, ps.amount, p.id p_id, p.name p_name, p.brandName p_brandName, p.sn p_sn, p.brand_id, d.id d_id, d.name d_name from productstock ps join product p on ps.product_id = p.id join depot d on ps.depot_id = d.id
where p.id = #{productId} and d.id = #{depotId}
